text: Ware wa, Isuraeru no shison ni umi o watara se, firuaun to sono gunzei wa, bogyaku to tekii ni michite kare-ra o tsuiseki shita. Oborejini-so ni natta toki, kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Watashi wa shinko itashimasu. Isuraeru no shison ga shinko suru kare no soto ni,-shin wa arimasen. Watashi wa fukuju, kie suru monodesu
